ygData.subject: Re: Re: Corpse
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t HAVE to but if you don t it will start becoming very expensive as you get higher lvls. As a newbie, as long as you aren t *twinked*, then losing your
ygData.messageBody:
You don't HAVE to but if you don't it will start
becoming very expensive as you get higher lvls. As a
newbie, as long as you aren't *twinked*, then losing your
guild tunic isn't that important and you get more food
until lvl 5, I think its lvl 5. Actually alot of people
kill themselves whenever they run out of food so they
don't have to buy more. 8) Just keep you money in the
bank after you go sell your stuff if you think you may
not want to go get your corpse if you
die.<br>-Khalista<br>Cleric of Tunare
